item.description:
Boston AREIA Meeting Schedule

Laurie Bachelder and MA Real Estate Attorney Frank Bridges

Did you know you can buy and sell real estate at a profit without owing taxes to the IRS? Join them as they explain the benefits of purchasing real estate through your Self-Directed IRA. You get the why, when, where and how!

Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma.

6:30PM Registration

7:00 PM Seminar

Visitors $40.00

Members only $20.00 (and you can use your BAREIA BUCKS!)

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Purchase Real Estate with your Self-Directed IRA
